person.persName: Hiram B. Miller (Breathitt County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier.)

body.p: Breathitt County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Perry County, Kentucky, native. Married to Elizabeth Strong Miller. Father of Granville Miller, Maranda Miller, Leander Miller, Elizabeth Miller, Miles Miller, and Andrew J. Miller. Farmer in Breathitt County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Breathitt County in 1860. Served in the 5th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (C.S.A.) as a private and second lieutenant from November 18, 1861, to November 1, 1863. Reported as deserted from Virginia on November 1, 1863.
